languages.text: "Когда-то эмоции низвергли мой народ с пьедестала правителей галактики, элантах. Потакание своим слабостям — или глупостям — не делает твой вид более привлекательным".

"It was emotions that once brought down my kind, elantach, toppling us from our pedestal as rulers of the galaxy. Indulging your weaknesses — or whims — does not make your species any more attractive."
languages.original_text: "Когда-то эмоции низвергли мой народ с пьедестала правителей галактики, элантах. Потакание своим слабостям — или глупостям — не делает твой вид более привлекательным".

traits.locale_text: "Once upon a time, the emotions of my kinsmen lead to the downfall of us as the galaxy rulers, elantach. Indulging your whims — or foolishness — doesn't make your kind more attractive."
"Once upon a time, the emotions of my kinsmen lead to the downfall of us as the galaxy rulers, elantach. Indulging your whims — or foolishness — doesn't make your kind more attractive."

"It was emotions that once brought down my kind, elantach, toppling us from our pedestal as rulers of the galaxy. Indulging your weaknesses — or whims — does not make your species any more attractive."

"It was emotions that once brought down my kind, elantach, toppling us from our pedestal as rulers of the galaxy. Indulging your weaknesses — or whims — does not make your species any more attractive."

"It was emotions that once brought down my kind, elantach, toppling us from our pedestal as rulers of the galaxy. Indulging your weaknesses — or whims — does not make your species any more attractive."

languages.text: “外界人，当初正是这种不加约束的情绪摧毁了我的族人，让他们从群星统治者的王座上陨落。若是沉溺于弱点与虚妄的幻想，恐怕并不会让你的种族变得更有吸引力。”
languages.original_text: "It was emotions that once brought down my kind, elantach, toppling us from our pedestal as rulers of the galaxy. Indulging your weaknesses — or whims — does not make your species any more attractive."

traits.locale_text: “外界人，当初正是这种不加约束的情绪摧毁了我的族人，让他们从群星统治者的王座上陨落。若是沉溺于弱点与虚妄的幻想，恐怕并不会让你的种族变得更有吸引力。”

languages.text: «Las emociones causaron el declive de mi especie en el pasado, elantach; nos derribaron de nuestro pedestal como soberanos de la galaxia. Dejaros llevar por vuestra debilidad (o vuestros caprichos) no hace que vuestra especie sea más atractiva».
languages.original_text: "It was emotions that once brought down my kind, elantach, toppling us from our pedestal as rulers of the galaxy. Indulging your weaknesses — or whims — does not make your species any more attractive."

traits.locale_text: «Las emociones causaron el declive de mi especie en el pasado, elantach; nos derribaron de nuestro pedestal como soberanos de la galaxia. Dejaros llevar por vuestra debilidad (o vuestros caprichos) no hace que vuestra especie sea más atractiva».

languages.text: « Ce sont les émotions qui ont causé le déclin de mes semblables, elantach. Ce sont elles qui nous ont fait tomber de notre piédestal de maîtres de la galaxie. Succomber à vos faiblesses... à vos caprices... ne rend pas votre espèce plus attirante. »
languages.original_text: "It was emotions that once brought down my kind, elantach, toppling us from our pedestal as rulers of the galaxy. Indulging your weaknesses — or whims — does not make your species any more attractive."

traits.locale_text: « Ce sont les émotions qui ont causé le déclin de mes semblables, elantach. Ce sont elles qui nous ont fait tomber de notre piédestal de maîtres de la galaxie. Succomber à vos faiblesses... à vos caprices... ne rend pas votre espèce plus attirante. »

languages.text: "Emotionen haben einst zum Niedergang meiner Art geführt, Elantach, und uns vom Podest als Herrscher der Galaxie gestürzt. Dass Ihr Eure Schwächen – oder Launen – auslebt, macht Eure Spezies keinen Deut attraktiver."
languages.original_text: "It was emotions that once brought down my kind, elantach, toppling us from our pedestal as rulers of the galaxy. Indulging your weaknesses — or whims — does not make your species any more attractive."

traits.locale_text: "Emotionen haben einst zum Niedergang meiner Art geführt, Elantach, und uns vom Podest als Herrscher der Galaxie gestürzt. Dass Ihr Eure Schwächen – oder Launen – auslebt, macht Eure Spezies keinen Deut attraktiver."

languages.text: 「かつて我の種族を崩壊させたのは感情だ、エランタ。我らを銀河の支配者の台座から転倒させたのだ。自分の弱さや気まぐれを甘やかすことが、自分の種族を魅力的なものに変えるというわけではない」
languages.original_text: "It was emotions that once brought down my kind, elantach, toppling us from our pedestal as rulers of the galaxy. Indulging your weaknesses — or whims — does not make your species any more attractive."

traits.locale_text: 「かつて我の種族を崩壊させたのは感情だ、エランタ。我らを銀河の支配者の台座から転倒させたのだ。自分の弱さや気まぐれを甘やかすことが、自分の種族を魅力的なものに変えるというわけではない」

languages.original_text: "It was emotions that once brought down my kind, elantach, toppling us from our pedestal as rulers of the galaxy. Indulging your weaknesses — or whims — does not make your species any more attractive."

languages.text: "Benim türümün sonu, duygularından geldi elantach. Galaksiye hükmederken devrilip düştük. Zayıflıklarına veya kaprislerine boyun eğmek, türünü daha çekici yapmıyor."
languages.original_text: "It was emotions that once brought down my kind, elantach, toppling us from our pedestal as rulers of the galaxy. Indulging your weaknesses — or whims — does not make your species any more attractive."

traits.locale_text: "Benim türümün sonu duygularından geldi elantach, galaksinin hükümdarıyken rezil rüsva olduk. Zayıflıklarına veya kaprislerine boyun eğmek, türünü daha çekici bir hâle getirmiyor."
